item.title: azure: Retirement: Azure Machine Learning - Data labeling Deprecation
item.description:
Azure Machine Learning’s built-in data labeling capability will be retired on September 30, 2026. Customers can continue to use the service until that date but should plan to transition to thirdâ€‘party data labeling providers before the retirement.

  • Source: Azure Updates
